articles.title: Greetings to Philippine President
articles.content:
Greetings to Philippine President
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Rodrigo Duterte, president of the Republic of Philippines, on the 119th anniversary of its independence.
					 In the message he sincerely congratulated the Philippine government and people on the great successes made in achieving the socio-political stability and the economic development under the leadership of the president.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished the president good health and happiness and success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Nepal
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Nepal
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Monday sent a congratulatory message to Krichna Bahadur Mahara on his appointment as deputy prime minister and minister of Foreign Affairs of Nepal.
					 The message expressed the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in line with the common desire and aspiration of the two peoples, wishing him success in his work.

articles.title: Director General of DPRK Foreign Ministry Visits Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Director General of DPRK Foreign Ministry Visits Equatorial Guinea
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Ho Yong Bok, department director general of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, and his party recently visited the Republic of Equatorial Guinea.
					 During the visit, the director general paid courtesy calls on the acting minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation who is its secretary of State, and on the minister of Agriculture, Stockbreeding and Food.
					
					 He also met and had talks with the vice-minister of Health and Social Welfare and the director general for Asia and Pacific of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation.
					
					 During the courtesy calls and talks he reiterated the stand of the DPRK to further boost the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation with a long history and tradition, introduced the achievements made by the Korean people in the drive for carrying out the 5-year strategy for national economy development and explained the validity of the steps for self-defence taken by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty.
					
					 Domingo Mituy Edjang Adugu, acting minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation who is its secretary of State, and other high-ranking officials of Equatorial Guinea said all countries have the right to defend their sovereignty.
					
					 It is the height of partiality that the missile tests of big powers are overlooked while the DPRK's missile tests are faulted, they added.
					
					 They noted that it is the firm stand of the president and government of Equatorial Guinea to further consolidate the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK.
					
					 A memorandum of understanding on cooperation between the foreign ministries of the two countries was adopted during the visit.
					
					 The two sides decided to further activate the visits of delegations of various levels and boost the cooperation in various fields including agriculture and public health.

articles.title: Sports Games of Orphans Opens
articles.content:
Sports Games of Orphans Opens
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Sports games of students from middle schools for orphans across the country was opened with due ceremony at Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School on Tuesday.
					 Students from secondary schools in provinces will compete in various events including football, volleyball and basketball.
					
					 Men's football match took place between the teams of Pyongyang City and South Hwanghae Province and women's volleyball match between the teams of Pyongyang City and North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The games will last till June 20.

articles.title: Three-Revolution Exhibition House Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Three-Revolution Exhibition House Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- 20 years have passed since leader Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Three-Revolution Exhibition House.
					 His field guidance on June 15, Juche 86 (1997) was a historic occasion as it brought about an epochal turn in the work of the exhibition house, an important education base in holding fast to the three revolutions--ideological, technological and cultural--which started with the general ideological mobilization movement for nation building, the campaign against illiteracy and the emulation drive for increased production initiated by President Kim Il Sung right after the liberation of the country, as the permanent general line of the Party.
					
					 The exhibition house has creditably discharged its mission and duty as a base of ideological education and a base for sci-tech dissemination for the last two decades.
					
					 190 sci-tech festivals and exhibitions were held there, including the national science and technology festival, national exhibition of inventions and new technologies and Pyongyang spring and autumn international trade fairs.
					
					 In those days the exhibition house was visited by nearly 9.7 millions of people, overseas compatriots and foreigners.

articles.title: Big Efforts Paid to Anti-imperialist Class Education in DPRK
articles.content:
Big Efforts Paid to Anti-imperialist Class Education in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been paid to intensifying anti-imperialist class education among working people, youths and schoolchildren in the DPRK.
					 Class education centers in different parts of the country have often organized lectures and story-telling given by witnesses to the crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists and class enemies.
					
					 And meetings to pledge revenge upon enemies took place on several occasions like the June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					
					 Meanwhile, many units across the country have arranged visits to the Central Class Education House, Sinchon Museum and Susan-ri House of Class Education.
					
					 The Sinchon Museum and Susan-ri House of Class Education serve as venues showing the monstrous atrocities perpetrated by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 On display at the Sinchon Museum are photos disclosing the brutality of the U.S. imperialists, weapons they used to kill people, remains of those killed, testimonies of survivors, etc.
					
					 When visiting the newly built Sinchon Museum in July Juche 104 (2015), respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un noted that to intensify the anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. education and class education is an issue of weighty importance as it is decisive of the prospect of the revolution and the destiny of the country. He also stressed the need to push ahead with this class education work consistently and in a sustainable manner.

articles.title: S. Koreans Closely Watch Authorities: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Koreans Closely Watch Authorities: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has buckled down to taming the south Korean authorities in an undisguised manner.
					 Sending government delegation, Congressional delegation and individual politicians to south Korea in succession, the U.S. is inquiring into the stand of its stooges to the north-south relations and THAAD deployment issue, stressing that "dialogue with the north is only possible under proper precondition" and "THAAD deployment should not be withdrawn as it was under the decision made between allies."
					
					 After summoning Chongwadae and Foreign Ministry authorities to Washington, the U.S. enticed them not to say anything offending at the south Korea-U.S. summit meeting due in the latter half of June, uttering such honeyed words that when the south Korean chief executive visits the U.S., it would "treat him with utmost courtesy".
					
					 Lurking behind this is the U.S. inveterate repugnancy to the democratic and pro-reform forces in south Korea, as well as the uneasiness about the a serous obstacle that may be created in the way of realizing its DPRK policy and strategy for domination over Asia-Pacific with the emergence of the present "government" in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. has tamed the democratic forces to keep pace with it with utmost vigilance whenever they rose to power in south Korea.
					
					 During Kim Dae Jung and Roh Moo-Hyun days, it ran the whole gamut of cynical ploy, summoning the south Korean ambassadors to the U.S., browbeating them into maintaining "alliance" with it and pressurizing them to accept the U.S. policy.
					
					 It is, therefore, clear that the upcoming "south Korea-U.S. summit meeting" would serve as an "open process for brainwashing" the south Korean chief executive.
					
					 What matters is that the present chief executive of south Korea, who caught interest of the public for his remarks that "he would always say 'no' to the U.S.", has now gone servile to the U.S., saying that "dialogue will be possible only when there is change in the north" and that "investigation into THAAD does not mean to change the existing decision", being frightened.
					
					 This is an evident submission to the U.S. and an act of treachery against the desire of the fellow countrymen for the improvement of the north-south relations and rejection of outsiders.
					
					 The south Korean authorities will be mistaken if they think they can maintain their political life by yielding to the U.S.
					
					 Servility to outsiders would lead to ruin and swimming with the mindset of the people is the only just way for existence and justice. This is the truth of history.
					
					 The successive conservative forces ranging from traitor Syngman Rhee to traitor Park Geun Hye were ousted from office before their expiry. It was because they were hell-bent on misrule against reunification and people at the beck and call of outsiders, while swimming against the will of the people.
					
					 A phrase referring to the present south Korean authorities as owner of ship and the public as water is in vogue among the south Koreans infuriated by the shameful submission to the U.S. now. This means that the water can keep the ship afloat or overturn it once they are enraged.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have to make clear their stand to this question of whether they would follow the people's mindset or would submit to the U.S.
					
					 The people are closely watching the authorities.

articles.title: Submission to U.S. Will Bring Ruin: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Submission to U.S. Will Bring Ruin: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean society now boils with rage over the puppet military group's concealment of the additional introduction of THAAD launch pads.
					 The former Chongwadae security office chief Kim Kwan Jin and Defence Minister Han Min Gu and other military bosses of south Korea introduced four launch pads of THAAD in addition and deliberately deleted the fact in the Chongwadae work report in a bid to conceal their crimes.
					
					 This is a huge crime and an act of treachery making a mockery and deception of the south Koreans dead-set against THAAD.
					
					 The puppet military brought six launch pads amounting to one battery of THAAD and has kept it in secrecy to the rage of the south Koreans.
					
					 The whole process of THAAD deployment pushed forward by traitor Park Geun Hye and the military group has been consistent with deception of the public and submission to the U.S.
					
					 A typical example is an attitude represented as "3NO".
					
					 When there was mounting prediction about the U.S. THAAD deployment in south Korea, the Park Geun Hye group feigned ignorance of it, saying that it remains unchanged in its "3NO stand", stressing that there was no negotiations and therefore, no results as there was no request from the U.S.
					
					 In 2014, Kim Kwan Jin, the then defence minister of south Korea, too, said that "THAAD is only in the middle of discussion and we have no plan to deploy it."
					
					 The official and unofficial discussions between the U.S. and south Korea were persistently pushed forward behind this and the decision on THAAD deployment was officially announced in July 2016.
					
					 The puppet military's despicable behavior of acting at the beck and call of its American master by taking the advantage of the chaotic political situation that followed the impeachment of Park Geun Hye is all the more disgusting.
					
					 The puppet military deceived the people that it would not deploy THAAD before the "presidential" election but at the end of April they brought to Songju, North Kyongsang Province most parts of THAAD including X-band radar all of a sudden overnight.
					
					 The controversial THAAD launch pads were also introduced in secrecy by the military in the same deceptive way.
					
					 The situation proves that Park Geun Hye and the military riff-raffs who acted as her cat's paws are a group of traitors keen on sycophantic treachery and a group of pro-American traitors who leave no means and methods untried to earn favor of their master.
					
					 Unless the group of top class criminals and the remnants of Park Geun Hye are removed to stop such practice as offering south Koreans as victims of a nuclear war while staking their fate on outsiders, it would be impossible to evade disaster to be caused by THAAD deployment.
					
					 It is the wish of the south Koreans that traitors who committed indelible crimes before the nation have to be sternly punished.
					
					 This is also the warning of the people to the present south Korean authorities.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are taking the stand that they can not withdraw THAAD deployment while talking about "alliance" with the U.S. even though they are threatening Kim Kwan Jin and Han Min Gu with investigation.
					
					 They should be mindful that their acceptance of the U.S. brigandish pressure for "THAAD" deployment would undermine the fundamental interests of the nation and bring their own destruction.

articles.title: DPRK Sure to Win Final Victory: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Sure to Win Final Victory: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- May was the month of victory for the DPRK with great events noteworthy in the history of building a nuclear power of Juche, but it was the month of disappointment for the U.S. and its vassal forces with despair and agony, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Vapor trails of Juche rockets in the sky in May are the orbit of brilliant victory making the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK bankrupt in face of the invincible strength and inexhaustible potentials for the development of the powerful Paektusan nation.
					
					 Various types of the DPRK's ballistic rockets were launched one after another to demonstrate all over the world that Juche Korea is fully ready for attack and defence.
					
					 The Juche rockets which displayed the dignity of the rapidly strengthened country and its inexhaustible national power are products of the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development of the Korean people who bravely tided over unprecedented ordeals under the worst sanctions of the hostile forces.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet military gangsters cry for miserable scream and piteous moan of the losers, frightened by the Juche missiles of the DPRK.
					
					 The victorious booms in May eloquently proved the justice of the cause of building a nuclear power of Juche Korea advancing according to the timetable and road map indicated by the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts and inevitability of its final victory.
					
					 If the U.S. continues challenging the just cause of the DPRK in disregard of the strong might and will of Juche Korea, it can never escape the merciless strike of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Sneers Disgraceful Behavior of Han Min Gu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Sneers Disgraceful Behavior of Han Min Gu
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- At the Asia Security Conference held in Singapore shortly ago, south Korean puppet Defence Minister Han Min Gu asked the U.S., Japan and other outsiders for "cooperation" against the DPRK, describing its nuclear test and missile launch as "direct threats".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Extremely disgusting is the behavior of Han Min Gu who runs amuck for confrontation with the fellow countrymen though he is about to retire from office.
					
					 The puppet group such as Han is the one of traitors and warmongers as they are running wild for military provocations against the fellow countrymen at the beck and call of their U.S. master in reckless pursuance of nuclear threat against the DPRK.
					
					 Traitor Han should have been sternly punished by history just as traitor Park Geun Hye was impeached.
					
					 He had committed indelible crimes, acting a nuclear war servant of the U.S. and dirty accomplice of Park. Such A-class criminal called for stifling the fellow countrymen, touring overseas. This disgusting practice can never be overlooked.
					
					 Mistrust and conflict are festering between the north and the south and the danger of a nuclear war increases on the Korean peninsula as such traitors as Han parasitic on foreign forces are allowed to be at large in south Korea.
					
					 It goes without saying that peace and reunification can come only when the traitors are removed as early as possible.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should be mindful that a disaster may come due to silly fools such as Han who does not control his tongue for hysteric confrontation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Hits at S. Korean Regime's Attitude toward Sanctions on DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Hits at S. Korean Regime's Attitude toward Sanctions on DPRK
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities have expressed support for the additional independent sanctions and "sanctions resolution" recently announced by the U.S. and the UNSC against the DPRK.
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary says:
					
					 This is an expression of the intention to zealously join the U.S. and its vassal forces in their frantic moves to deter the DPRK's bolstering up of nuclear force and stifle it.
					
					 It is also no more than an extension of traitor Park Geun Hye's policy of dependence on outsiders and confrontation with compatriots in the north.
					
					 After the end of the Park regime, all Koreans have become evermore enthusiastic in their will to improve the deadlocked north-south relations at an early date and pave the road of independent reunification by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 At this time, the south Korean authorities groundlessly take issue with the DPRK's steps for self-defense, disregarding the nation's desire for improved north-south relations and keeping the anachronistic conception of confrontation. It is as foolish an act as harming the nation's interests while letting outsiders fish in troubled waters.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly understand this. If they do not want to meet the same miserable fate as that of Park Geun Hye, more dead than alive, they should make a bold decision to give up the policy of dependence on outsiders and confrontation.

articles.title: Struggle against Sale of Traitor Chun's "Reminiscence" Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against Sale of Traitor Chun's "Reminiscence" Launched in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Foundation for Commemorating May 18 Incident launched a struggle for checking the sale of traitor Chun Doo Hwan's "reminiscence", according to the south Korean MBC on June 11.
					 The organization claimed that Chun's "reminiscence" should be abolished as it is run through with false information about the massacre in Kwangju.
					
					 It stressed that it would struggle to get the "reminiscence" scrapped in solidarity with organizations of various circles.

articles.title: All-People Memorial Meeting Held in Seoul
articles.content:
All-People Memorial Meeting Held in Seoul
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Seoul on June 10 to mourn those who dedicated their lives to the struggle for national reunification and democracy of the south Korean society on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the June Popular Resistance, according to the south Korean online newspaper Voice of People.
					 Speakers at the meeting said that they ousted an unjust repressive regime through candlelight resistance this year marking the 30th anniversary of the June resistance, true to the intention of those who lost their lives in the resistance.
					
					 The biggest evils in the south Korean society are the "Security Law" and the racket of branding the demonstrators as "followers of the north", they said, declaring that they would launch an all-people campaign to probe into the truth behind the brutal crackdown, punish those responsible for it and put an end to the vices of the conservative forces.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Jong Il Praised by Body of DR Congo
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Jong Il Praised by Body of DR Congo
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo released an information bulletin on June 8 on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin praised his party building feats in such articles as "The whole life dedicated to the happiness of the people".
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea, founded by President Kim Il Sung, into the guiding idea in the era of independence through his distinguished ideo-theoretical activities and defended socialism with a treasured sword of Songun and provided a turning-point in the building of a powerful state, it said, adding:
					
					 He had the historic north-south declarations adopted through his energetic leadership, thus opening up bright vistas for reunifying Korea by the Korean nation itself without any foreign interference and making a great contribution to the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 He made endless journey of field guidance always in his simple jumper, taking short and uncomfortable sleeps and eating simple rice-balls. He devoted his all to the people, regarding their happiness as his pleasure.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification Supported
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on June 3 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The joint declaration calls for reunifying the country by the Korean nation's own efforts free from outside interference.
					
					 The declaration representing the unanimous will and wish of all Koreans who are desirous of the reunification is a precious fruit of the energetic leadership of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 After its publication, there had been brisk dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south of Korea in various fields.
					
					 But everything went up in smoke and the joint declaration was not implemented due to the puppet groups of Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The south Korean people should wage a vigorous struggle against the provocative nuclear war drills of the U.S. imperialists and for social independence and democracy.
					
					 We fully support the struggle of the Korean people for driving the U.S. imperialists out of south Korea and reunifying the country as soon as possible.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Moves Condemned by German, British Organizations
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Moves Condemned by German, British Organizations
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- German and British organizations made public statements on June 5 and 6 as regards the fact that the hostile forces are getting hell-bent on the sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					 Noting that the UNSC again cooked up "sanctions resolution" over the DPRK's ballistic rocket launch aimed to bolster up its nuclear force, the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said in its statement:
					
					 Such wrong and unfair behavior proves that the UNSC is turning into a "council for causing unrest".
					
					 The U.S. may flout the world as it pleases and modernize the nuclear weapons and launch ballistic rocket, but the DPRK should not do the same things. This attitude is the height of double standards and an act of the guilty party filing suit first.
					
					 The UNSC has become a plaything of the U.S. as it persistently takes issue with the DPRK's legitimate measures for self-defence while disregarding the imprudent moves of the U.S. engaging itself in war, murder and arson everywhere in the world.
					
					 The DPRK's treasured sword of justice will mercilessly smash the hostile forces wherever they are.
					
					 No sanctions will block the vigorous advance of the DPRK.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said: The Korean people will not step back even an inch from the road of nuclear buildup, chosen by them to defend the dignity of the country and the nation's right to existence and realize the genuine international justice, under any sanctions and pressure but will more dynamically advance towards the final victory.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente filipino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente filipino
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 12 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Filipinas, Rodrigo Duterte, con motivo del 119o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					El remitente extendio sinceras felicitaciones al destinatario por muchos exitos que logran bajo su guia el gobierno y pueblo filipinos en sus tareas para alcanzar la estabilidad sociopolitica y el desarrollo economico del pais.
					
					Convencido de que se desarrollaran aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, deseo al dignatario buena salud y felicidad y exitos en sus responsabilidades.

articles.title: Director del MINREX se reune con las personalidades de Guinea Ecuatorial
articles.content:
Director del MINREX se reune con las personalidades de Guinea Ecuatorial
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- El director del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ho Yong Bok, y su comitiva visitaron recientemente a la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial.
					Durante su estancia, el visitante realizo las visitas de cortesia al ministro interino de Asuntos Exteriores y Cooperacion quien es secretario de Estado de la misma cartera y al ministro de Agricultura, Ganaderia y Alimentacion y converso por separado con el viceministro de Salud y Bienestar Social y el director general de la Direccion para  Asia y Pacifica del Ministerio de Asuntos Exteriores y Cooperacion.
					
					En esas ocasiones, el reafirmo la posicion de la RPDC de seguir ampliando y desarrollando las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises que tienen larga historia y tradicion. 
					
					Presento los exitos que ha alcanzado el pueblo coreano en su empeno por cumplir la Estrategia Quinquenal para el Desarrollo de Economia Nacional y explico la justeza de las medidas de autodefensa tomadas para defender la soberania del pais.
					
					Domingo Mituy Edjang Adugu, ministro interino de Asuntos Exteriores y Cooperacion y secretario de Estado de la misma cartera, y otras altas personalidades de Guinea Ecuatorial senalaron que todos los paises tienen el derecho a defender su soberania y anadieron que resulta el climax de parcialidad guardar silencio de los lanzamientos de prueba de misiles de las potencias y cuestionar solamente los mismos de la RPDC.
					
					Senalaron que el presidente y el gobierno de Guinea Ecuatorial mantienen la firme posicion de consolidar aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con la RPDC.
					
					Durante la visita de la delegacion coreana, quedo suscrita la nota de entendimiento sobre la cooperacion entre el MINREX de la RPDC y el Ministerio de Asuntos Exteriores y Cooperacion de la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial. 
					
					Y se discutieron los problemas como frecuentar la visita de las delegaciones de diferentes niveles y ampliar y desarrollar la cooperacion en varios dominios, inclusive la agricultura y salud publica.

articles.title: Inaugurada competencia deportiva de miembros de orfanatos de todo el pais
articles.content:
Inaugurada competencia deportiva de miembros de orfanatos de todo el pais
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 13 en la Escuela Secundaria de Internado de Pyongyang la competencia deportiva de los miembros de las escuelas de internado de todo el pais.
					En el conclave alumnos de las escuelas secundarias de internado de todas las provincias entablaran los partidos de futbol, voleibol y baloncesto y otras disciplinas.
					
					Este dia, se efectuaron el partido de futbol masculino entre los equipos de la ciudad de Pyongyang y la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur y el de voleibol femenino entre los equipos de la ciudad de Pyongyang y la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte.
					
					La competencia deportiva se concluira el 20.

articles.title: ACNC exige a autoridades surcoreanas liberarse de la sumision proyanqui
articles.content:
ACNC exige a autoridades surcoreanas liberarse de la sumision proyanqui
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- Se ha revelado en el Sur de Corea el hecho de que los compinches de la capa militar surcoreana encubrieron la introduccion adicional de plataformas de lanzamiento de THAAD.
					Kim Kwan Jin, ex jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad de Chongwadae, Han Min Gu, ministro de Defensa Nacional titere, y otras camarillas de la capa militar introdujeron adicionalmente 4 plataformas de lanzamiento del sistema antimisil. Sin embargo, a fin de encubrir sus crimenes tacharon intencionalmente los sucesos en el parte sobre trabajos de "Chongwadae". 
					
					El presente caso constituye un crimen pesimo que engano y burlo a la poblacion surcoreana y ademas una traicion proyanqui. 
					
					Causan una gran indignacion de los habitantes las locuras de la capa militar que encubrio hasta la fecha la introduccion de las 6 plataformas correspondientes a una bateria de THAAD. 
					
					Durante toda la trayectoria de despliegue del demonio belico, la traidora Park Geun-hye y los compinches de la capa militar enganaron a la poblacion surcoreana y obedecieron a yanqui. 
					
					Su posicion "3No" sirve de un ejemplo representativo del engano. 
					
					Cuando circulaba una opinion publica sobre el emplazamiento de THAAD en el suelo surcoreano, la banda de Park abogo por su posicion de "3NO" diciendo que "no habian negociaciones ni resultados porque no hubo la peticion de EE.UU." 
					
					Kim Kwan Jin, que era en 2014 el ministro de Defensa Nacional, habia chismeado que el "THAAD esta en discusion en EE.UU. y que el pais no tiene el plan de introducirlo y ubicarlo".
					
					Pero, detras de esa cortina, no cesaron las conversaciones oficiales y extraoficiales entre EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea y se ha declarado oficialmente en julio de 2016 la resolucion de ubicacion de THAAD.
					
					La capa militar surcoreana titere se entrego a su amo norteamericano que intenta ubicar el sistema antimisil aprovechando la desordenada situacion politica causada por la dimision de Park.
					
					Los compinches militares mintieron a la poblacion diciendo que no instalarian el sistema antimisil antes de las "elecciones presidenciales". Pero, por la noche avanzada de finales de abril pasado introdujeron de manera sorpresiva en Songju de la provincia de Kyongsang del Norte la mayoria de los equipos de THAAD inclusive el radar X-Band. 
					
					Las 4 plataformas en cuestion tambien fueron introducidas bajo tales enganos. 
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente que Park y los sobrevivientes de la capa militar son la horda de traidores enloquecidos en el servilismo a granes potencias y se valen de todos los medios y maneras para congraciarse con su patron.
					
					Sera imposible evitar las calamidades originadas por el despliegue de THAAD sin eliminar a los remanentes de Park que mantienen su vida a cambio de servilismo a grandes potencias y sacrifican sin vacilacion alguna a sus habitantes como victima de la guerra nuclear ni liquidar las maldades causadas por ellos.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos exigen unanimemente a las actuales autoridades la pena capital de estos traidores que obedeciendo a yanqui, cometieron los delincuentes inauditos ante la nacion coreana.
					
					Para atenuar la colera sobre el caso sensacional, las autoridades surcoreanas insisten en la investigacion sobre Kim Kwan Jin, Han Min Gu y otros involucrados, por una parte y por la otra, toman una posicion de no retirar el emplazamiento de THAAD diciendo de la "alianza" con el pais norteamericano.
					
					A traves del presente incidente, ellas deben tener bien presente que podran danar los intereses principales de la nacion y darles el arruinamiento, si siguen doblegandose a la presion bandidesca de EE.UU.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se burla de conducta bochornosa de Han Min Gu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun se burla de conducta bochornosa de Han Min Gu
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- En la Conferencia de Seguridad de Asia recien efectuada en Singapur, el ministro de Defensa Nacional surcoreano, Han Min Gu, mendigo la "cooperacion anti-Norte (de Corea)" a Estados Unidos, Japon y otras fuerzas extranjeras diciendo que "la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de misiles del Norte constituyen la amenaza directa".
					Nos da la pena ver tal conducta bochornosa de Han Min Gu que se dedica a los actos fratricidas hasta en los ultimos momentos de su cargo, espantado ante las medidas tomadas por la RPDC para el incremento de su capacidad de autodefensa.
					
					Asi ironiza el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					Sumandose a la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. encaminada a agredir a la RPDC, los vendepatrias y belicistas surcoreanos como Han cometen sin parar los actos de provocacion militar contra la parte connacional. 
					
					Ese traidor debio ser castigado duro por la historia cuando Park Geun-hye fue expulsada del poder.
					
					No se puede tolerar que el criminal de la primera clase, que cometio imperdonables crimenes siendo sirviente de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y complice de la traidora Park, haya abogado hasta en el extranjero por la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					Puesto que andan impunes en el Sur de Corea los traidores como Han, se agravan la desconfianza y el antagonismo entre el Norte y el Sur y se aumenta el peligro de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Esta claro que llegaran la paz y la reunificacion cuando sean liquidados los traidores.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener presente que les pueden causar desgracias los tontos chismosos como Han Min Gu.
